msg: Fix for HADOOP-77.  Fixes some NPEs.  Contributed by Stefan.

author: jkf
msg: Patch for PR28914 / similar (maybe even identical) to the proposed patch of Benjamin Burgess

author: cutting
msg: Fix for HADOOP-70.  Unit tests should have their own hadoop-site.xml and mapred-default.xml, so that local modifications to these files in conf/ don't alter unit testing.  Also rename TestDFS so that it is not normally run, and add a new test target which runs tests using the config files in conf/.

author: snoopdave
msg: Fixing ROL-1071 and change to make all versions of query use same columns
